Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the Fair Fares NYC program
Summary: Requires that any individual who is eligible for the Fair Fares and any person whose income is two hundred percent of the federal poverty level receive a fifty percent discount on trips using the Long Island Rail Road or Metro-North Railroad within the city of New York; defines terms.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the Fair Fares NYC program
